Bash(timeout 30 bash -c 'for i in {1..10}; do
  result=$\(curl -s ""https://api.github.com/repos/Fe0fan0v/english-crm/actions/runs?per_page=1"" 2>/dev/null\)
  status=$\(echo ""$result"" | python -c ""import sys,json; d=json.load\(sys.stdin\); r=d[\\""workflow_runs\\""][0] if d[\\""workflow_runs\\""] else {}; print\(r.get\(\\""status\\"",\\""N/A\\""\)\)"" 2>/dev/null\)
  conclusion=$\(echo ""$result"" | python -c ""import sys,json; d=json.load\(sys.stdin\); r=d[\\""workflow_runs\\""][0] if d[\\""workflow_runs\\""] else {}; print\(r.get\(\\""conclusion\\"",\\""N/A\\""\)\)"" 2>/dev/null\)
  sha=$\(echo ""$result"" | python -c ""import sys,json; d=json.load\(sys.stdin\); r=d[\\""workflow_runs\\""][0] if d[\\""workflow_runs\\""] else {}; print\(r.get\(\\""head_sha\\"",\\""N/A\\""\)[:7]\)"" 2>/dev/null\)
  echo ""[$i] Status: $status, Conclusion: $conclusion, SHA: $sha""
  if [ ""$conclusion"" = ""success"" ] && [ ""$sha"" = ""953f12b"" ]; then
    echo ""Deploy completed successfully!""
    exit 0
  fi
  sleep 3
done')
